data.name: Sefirot Shards
data.detailed_description:
“Sefirot Shards” is a deck-building game with RPG elements, imbued with the spirit of classical fantasy. Build your unique deck and solve all the mysteries that Sefirot has prepared for you.

A young team of indie developers “Team Game” presents their first project “Sefirot Shards”. We hope that you will greatly enjoy your time in our game and won't judge it too harshly, since every member of the team, from the chief director to an accountant, already did that for you :).

We strived to make the combat interesting and moderately complex. The perfect phrase to describe it would be 'easy to learn, hard to master'. Here you will always have something to do: explore the locations, collect the cards and fight other players. You will get around quickly due to an intuitive interface that is familiar to all connoisseurs of the genre, and also easy for new players to understand.

You will get to know the story… of yourself, where tragedy and humor, idle talk and philosophy, senselessness and ruthlessness will intertwine as one. And most importantly, as in the best traditions of the RPG genre - your choice won’t have any consequences whatsoever! So enough talk - go and uncover all the mysteries of Sefirot!

  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 400
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
